thread.section_title: Britishgas Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.britishgas.co.uk
thread.title: Chr

author: Chr
title: Chr
text:
Send 3 e-mails and no answer in 1 week.
The webpage it's not working well, I submited 4 times the meter readings and several erros.
Moreover BritishGAS have expensive GAS tariff....
How is possible to having a web page with so many errors and the emails no answering?
And if you try different addresses you get:
meter_read(a)britishgas.co.uk
The email address that you entered couldn't be found. Check the address and try resending the message. If the problem continues, please contact your helpdesk.
account(a)britishgas.co.uk
The email address that you entered couldn't be found. Check the address and try resending the message. If the problem continues, please contact your helpdesk.
customerservices(a)britishgas.co.uk
The email address that you entered couldn't be found. Check the address and try resending the message. If the problem continues, please contact your helpdesk.
I want to contact them by email and I CAN'T , Incredible disappointment ....
So better options are there outside....
